title: Blood Flow Restriction: Not BDSM, but the Peloton’s Most Mysterious Marginal Gain
content:
Blood flow restriction is being used for rehab, recovery, and to augment training. But in many cases, the implementation of this curious performance hack doesn't stack up to the science.

Read the full article at Blood Flow Restriction: Not BDSM, but the Peloton’s Most Mysterious Marginal Gain on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
